mainTextHeader: So what on earth actually is this page?
mainText: It's pretty much just a random page for me to chuck all the weird things I make/half make onto. Don't expect anything actually useful - you're never gonna get it!
nws: Yup! A couple friends and I decided to have a semi-competition to make a Discord bot. I've linked to their respective discord servers on a project page, which you should be able to find either by going to projects and clicking on the right project, or by following this link.
